replies.body: Me after the ranked season>> {{summoner:3}}

I made it into gold with about a week before they closed ranked. I haven't touched the game for fear I might get demoted. 
{{champion:412}}  Support Life
I DID THAT EXCEPT WITH SILVER
I did that except with platinum. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I did that except with bronze!{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
I did that except with unranked
same
got my friend gold at 5 minutes left op
Thanks for boosting.  And posting it on the Riot message board.
Not necessarily boosting. Could have made gold and then helped his silver 1 or 2 friend get there. Don't assume things.
You just described boosting.
Boosting is when you use their account and play for them, that is bannable. DuoQ =/= Boosting
carrying is the same thing as boosing if your trying to get another account to a rank they didnt get on their own

Its not though lol its not again riots terms or anything its called duo queing which is completely legal a division ahead meaning g1/s1 but not g1/s2 sure plenty of people get "boosted" up this way. Its a completely fair part of the game though to duo que with friends.
it is after all a team game and it certainly helps if you can rely on at least one person

Fuck no I didn't reach my goal. Here's why!
1. The ranked scoring system is garbage! No Matter how well I play. I always have 3-4 shitty kids with no clue how to play! You can't help these kids because no matter how nice you are about trying to help them, they automatically get pissed and tilt! What does Riot do about this. It shortens the time it takes to get to level 30 by half so now the game is FLOODED with even shittier kids!
2. Every other game has an AFK, rager, INT feeder or some foreign kid that DC's every 5 seconds because he has a garbage computer.
3. All of you scrubs that are going to type 'well your just bad, if you were good you would carry yourself out like I did" Except be honest, you didn't carry shit but rather got carried out if at all!
4. I could go on for several more reason but that's going to have to wait, i have to go to work. Plus I have to vote for Hilary!!!!!!!

Statistically speaking, you have an advantage by having more "shitty level 30 kids" in the ranked system. That is, unless you are one yourself. Think of it this way; you have 4 teammates, and the enemy team has 5. That creates a larger chance for the ENEMY team to have "shitty level 30s" over your team, thanks to the extra open position. I mean, you could be at a constant disadvantage if you permanently fill the role of shitty level 30 yourself, but who knows? :)
That was the nicest way to put someone in the dirt I think I've seen all year. Kudos to you for keeping it real while also not being an ass about it.

Congratulations on ranking up a smurf, you're part of the reason that climbing out of low elo is so difficult. One of my favorite things to do is watching the smurf on the enemy team go 20/0 and completely ruin any chance of my team winning purely based on his existence.

I made it to silver this year so...yay? well I can say I made it out of bronze.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Me too made it out of bronze 5 to plat 5 after 2000 ranked games {{summoner:3}}
2000? Holy hell I couldn't imagine playing that much in a single season. Nice job keeping at it!
Had an AFK in my last promo to silver :'( FML
Cant carry a 4v5: reported.

Was Silver II last season, got put Silver IV this season, climbed back to Silver II

And then I started having computer issues like the day of and day before ranked ended so I couldn't play anymore riperonis me

But I didn't go down in rank so I guess that's good?
that means you didn't improve

> [{quoted}](name=GamingProdigy15,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=UXJ3zJR2,comment-id=00690000,timestamp=2016-11-08T17:01:11.956+0000)
>
> that means you didn't improve

But I didn't do worse
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
And, honestly, that's what matters. Computer issues aside, being able to climb right back to where you were is a good sign; it means you didn't do it on luck, you did it on skill.

That timer was disappointing as hell :(
No special animation when it hit 0 at least?
even a party horn sound effect played over and over and a surprise party fiddlesticks drawn in MS Paint would have been nice
That would have been so dope.  I hope Rito does exactly that for New Year's.

Haha yeah right...

This is Rito we're talking about. At most we'll get a New Year's Icon.

But I'd love that though

Good luck to everyone in the new season and may the odds be ever in your favor. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
you too m8. I hope your placements go well
we might be stuck in elo hell again not fun at all
if you climbed out once you'll climb out again
took me 5months cause no time wish me luck
played my provisionals the second i hit level 30, got placed into bronze 1, barely played any rank until yesterday, and hit silver 5 in one day just for le border
Been there buddy, good luck with recovery (if not done already)!
=) I made Diamond a few weeks back and called it good for the year. Good luck to everyone in future seasons, I am pretty happy of having reached my goal, next year we shoot for the stars!
when does the next season start?
Rough estimated dated for Jan 19-21st, basing that is started Jan 20th the last two years.
7th of December.
That early? Awesome, right before Christmas break. {{summoner:6}}
i didn't get gold :c i get teams that don't know how to teamfight xD or push{{item:3070}}

Well for starters, stop playing every single Champion under the sun and focus on a handful and master them if you want to climb. Secondly it's not your team's fault you didn't make Gold. Have to focus entirely on your own play.
It's always the teams fault. It's a team game. One trash feeder can determine the outcome of the game.
But the feeders, assuming you aren't the one in your game, will be on the other team too. It's a numbers game. Win more than you lose and you'll climb.
